title: Silver 4 Jungle & Mid main looking for Team or Duo.
body:
Title pretty much says it all, But ill include a little bit of story behind it.

I am currently Silver 4, Last season Gold 4. I am looking for either a duo to climb the ladder with or just a team to secure my place in a competitive nature. I am currently trying to climb the solo queue ladder but failing to do so (Usually thanks to some pretty bad or Toxic players) but i try to keep a positive mindset about it.

Jungle: I like to play Aggressive and Damage style Junglers like {{champion:421}}  and  {{champion:121}}  but can also play the Tank style ones like  {{champion:113}} and {{champion:79}} . I am more then versatile in learning new champions if needed. There are few champs i cant jungle with though, Like Lee Sin..

Mid: I like bursty brawling champions like {{champion:103}}  {{champion:1}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:127}} but can also play the AD Mids.

Feel free to add me in game or post bellow!

replies.body: I would be happy to duo with you or add you into the ranked team i'm in. But i am in B3 slowly getting out because bronze is a trap. Add Me - Deep Sanity
Add Jepman if you'd be interested in joining our ranked team. We are trying to grow an active roster, mainly play at nights from 9.30 AEST.
